<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Raining Knives Snare](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1304)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Mechanical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=105" />
<trait label="Snare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=146" />
<trait label="Trap" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=158" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 43</row>

**Price** 170 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

As soon as a creature enters the snare's square, it unleashes a barrage of knives at the creature from all directions, dealing 11d8 piercing damage (DC 29 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Raining Knives Snare
